title: Monopoly To Replace Thimble Piece - The Onion - America's Finest News Source
text:
World Begins Another Day At Mercy Of 19-Year-Old Estonian Hacker TALLINN, ESTONIA—With the private data of national governments and entire global industries at his fingertips, sources confirmed this morning that yet another day had begun with the whole world helplessly at the mercy of 19-year-old Estonian computer hacker Jüri Pevkur. End Of Section AMERICAN VOICES 2.22.17 February 22, 2017 Vol 53 Issue 07 Monopoly To Replace Thimble Piece 
After crowdsourcing the question of which piece to replace in Monopoly, Hasbro confirmed that the thimble will soon be phased out in favor of one of 56 new options, including a hashtag and an emoji. What do you think? “Times change. Not everything can stay as relevant as a top hat.” Mike Slessers Systems Analyst “So much for playing out my long-held fantasies of a lowly thimble rising up out of obscurity to corner the Atlantic City real estate market.” Dottie D'Angelo Footage Reviewer “I drink the delicious tears of the morons who voted to lose the wheelbarrow.” Jake Dingman Unemployed WATCH VIDEO FROM THE ONION Trending Now
